title: SWE - Security Research Engineer, SEAR (Early Career)
summary: Help Apple secure the world’s most advanced consumer devices, which people trust to store their personal and professional data.
description: You are joining an exceptional team focusing on securing our remote attack surfaces across Apple platforms. From iMessage to media formats and FaceTime to memory allocators, you will be working alongside a wide variety of teams and vendors.
preferred_qualifications: Knowledge of modern anti-exploitation mitigations and their effectiveness.Reverse engineering using tools such as IDA Pro or GhidraKnowledge of macOS and iOS security architectures.Knowledge of memory safe languages.Proficiency with assembly languages, ARM64 is a big plus.
